Info.title: How to Make a simple REST Api using React, Spring Boot and SQLite
Info.desc: Explains how to a Spring Boot RestAPI with a React frontend. Most of this information comes from this [video](https://youtu.be/L5QXRoTtPr4?si=xZyqBTONtKYb-QeE).

Instructions.instruction: BEFORE YOU DO ANY OF THIS, go to the &Create a Project Templates Folder&[TemplatesLink] link above and complete all the instructions if you haven't done so already. After you do that, run the following command in your terminal to create new vue project. It will be named "react-sqlite-frontend" and will be created in your top-most directory.

Instructions.instruction: Now open a new terminal and run the following command. It will rename your project to be "spring-boot-sqlite"

Run the following commands to crate new folders/files in your project. Instead of using the "touch" commands, I'd recommend just right clicking on folders in VSCode and press "New file" for Java files. It will auto-generate packages and boiler-plate code for the file. I just included the "touch" commands because I thought they'd be convenient.

Code.FormatCode:
cd spring-boot-sqlite/src/main/java/com/springbackend/demo

mkdir controllers
mkdir models
mkdir repositories
mkdir services

touch controllers/UserController.java
touch models/User.java
touch repositories/UserRepository.java
touch services/UserService.java

Instructions.instruction: Go to src -> main -> java -> com -> springbackend -> demo -> controllers and then open the "UserController.java" file. Paste in the following code.
Now open a new terminal and run the following commands. If you don't see an explicit error message and it's running, it mean's it working. Press "control + c" to make it stop running.

In your terminal run the following commands. You could also do change into "hw" then run "npm init" and fill in the prompts to create "package.json", but we'll keep it more simple for now. Also install the necessary mvn dependencies.

Code.FormatCode:
cd ~
cd spring-boot-sqlite
touch package.json
touch start.sh

Instructions.instruction: Go back to your folder in VSCode, and then press "command + p". Search for and press on "applications.properties". Delete its contents and paste the following code in the file.
Now open your "start.sh" file and paste in the following code.

Code.FormatCode:
#!/bin/sh
YELLOW='\033[0;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

stop_spring_boot() {
  echo "\n\n${YELLOW}Spring Boot application finished successfully!${NC}"
  kill "$SPRING_BOOT_PID"
}

trap stop_spring_boot INT TERM

mvn --quiet spring-boot:run &
SPRING_BOOT_PID=$!

sleep 0.1

echo "* Running on ${BLUE}http://localhost:8080${NC}\n"

wait "$SPRING_BOOT_PID"
